docblock.description: Tag Manifest extension of AbstractManifest class.
The bag this manifest is part of.
The hash algorithm for this manifest.
Associative array where paths are keys and hashes are values.
Array of the same paths as in $hashes but normalized for case and characters to check for duplication.
The filename for this manifest.
Array of files on disk to validate against.
Errors while validating this manifest.
Warnings generated while validating this manifest.
Errors/Warnings generated while loading.
docblock.long-description: Because of the path key in the hash array if there are multiple entries for a path we need to track it during load but present it at validate().

docblock.description: PayloadManifest constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The bag this manifest is part of.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The BagIt name of the hash algorithm.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether we are loading an existing file

docblock.description: Update the hashes for each path.
Compare file hashes against what is on disk.
Is the filename match a tag manifest file?

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if it is a tagmanifest file.

docblock.description: Manifest constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The bag this manifest is part of.

tag.name: param

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether we are loading an existing file

docblock.description: Return the algorithm for this manifest.
Return the filename of this manifest.
Return the array of errors.
Return the array of warnings.
Update the hashes for each path.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: Error writing the manifest file to disk.

docblock.description: Compare file hashes against what is on disk.
Return the payload and hashes as an associative array.
Common checks for paths being added to a manifest.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path relative to the bag root.

docblock.description: Load the paths and hashes from the file on disk, does not validate.
Utility to recreate the manifest file using the currently stored hashes.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If we can't write the manifest files.

docblock.description: Calculate the hash of the file.
Add an error using the current filename.
Add a warning using the current filename.
Needed to account for differences in PHP hash to BagIt hash naming.

tag.name: return
tag.description: the PHP hash name for the internal hash encoding.

docblock.description: Add a path to the list of normalized paths.
Compare a path against a list of normalized paths and look for matches.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if there is a match.

docblock.description: Normalize a path for character representation and case.
Clean up file paths to remove extraneous period, double period and slashes

tag.name: return
tag.description: The cleaned up absolute file path, not resolved on disk.

docblock.description: Clean up file paths to remove extraneous periods, double periods and slashes

tag.name: return
tag.description: The cleaned up relative file path or blank if not in the bag Root.

docblock.description: Add a load error using the current filename. This is only erased on a new load.
Add a load warning using the current filename. This is only erased on a new load.
Utility to reset the load issues construct.

docblock.description: Abstract manifest class to hold common elements between Payload and Tag manifests.
The bag this manifest is part of.
The hash algorithm for this manifest.
Associative array where paths are keys and hashes are values.
Array of the same paths as in $hashes but normalized for case and characters to check for duplication.
The filename for this manifest.
Array of files on disk to validate against.
Errors while validating this manifest.
Warnings generated while validating this manifest.
